mapper.select: SELECT CLS, SN, MODEL, SPEC, WAR_START, WAR_END, MANU_COM, MAC, STATE FROM EQUIPMENT
mapper.update: UPDATE EQUIPMENT SET CLS = #{newClass}, SN = #{newSN}, MODEL = #{newModel}, SPEC = #{newSpec}, WAR_START = #{newWarStart}, WAR_END = #{newWarEnd}, MANU_COM = #{newManuCom}, MAC = #{newMAC}, STATE = #{newState} WHERE UID = #{UID}
